full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YUL GYI DUG SEL BA'I YUL LHA'I GTOR 'BUL SMAN DPA' BO CHIG THUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B ('DI NYID YUL GYI DUG SEL BA'I YUL LHA'I GTOR 'BUL SMAN DPA' BO CHIG THUB CES BYA BA, 'DI NI RIGS RUS SHIN TU MTHO ZHING LUGS ZUNG MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN DANG LDAN PA DAD PA BRTAN PA DAM TSIG GTZANG MA TID T'A KHI PI PE'I LI DA LAS TSU KHUR DPON RIN PO CHE BDE LEGS PHUN TSOGS GTZO BCAS, BLA CHEN RNAMS DANG, SHOG GI DPON BLON 'BANGS MTHA' YAS PAS, KHO BO LA SNYING NYE BA'I SEMS KYIS SPRING YIG MAndAL KHA BTAGS DANG BCAS PA 'BYOR ZHU BA'I LAN DPE CHA GSAR DU SBYAR BA 'DI DANG BCAS, DAD LDAN SLOB MA'I TSOGS RNAMS LA, RIG 'DZIN SNYING 'DUS PA TE DZVA BADZRAS GDAMS PAR MDZAD DE SPRINGS PA'O, ,DGE 'DIS @005A *, ,MTSON PA'I RNAM DKAR RNAMS KYIS YUL 'DI DANG GZHAN LA'ANG, RDZOGS LDAN GYI DUS BZHIN DU BDE BSKYID PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING TSE RING NAD MED BSOD NAMS RI BO BZHIN DU BRTAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR NAS RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR TSE MTHA' YAS PA'I LUNG RTOGS KYI BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO, YUL GYI MCHOG MOS LDAN DE NAS DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
